# Butterfly

> Notes that change the world

---

Butterfly is a note app where your ideas come first. You can paint, add texts, and export them easily on every device. This app works on android, windows, linux, and in the web.

## Features

* **‚ö° Simple and intuitive** Every tool is in the right place. Open the app and start drawing. Change your tools by clicking on it.
* **üé® Customizable** Change everything to your needs. Choose your custom color, create a palette, and add your pages to the paper. The paper has an infinite size, perfect for your ideas and notes.
* **üíª Your data will be saved locally**. Everything will be saved locally on your computer. Export the notes as images or as json files which can be opened on a different device.

## I need your help

You can help me to make this app better. You can report issues, request features or develop. Click [here](https://docs.butterfly.linwood.dev/contributing) for more information.
If you need help, don't hesitate to ask questions. You can reach me on discord or at <contact@linwood.dev>.

</p>

## Comparison

| Name                             | ‚ö° Butterfly ‚ö° | OneNote                                            |
| -------------------------------- | ------------- | -------------------------------------------------- |
| Add texts, draw, erase           | ‚úÖ             | ‚úÖ                                                  |
| Organizing your ideas in folders | ‚úÖ             | ‚úÖ                                                  |
| Web version                      | ‚úÖ             | ‚úÖ                                                  |
| Synchronization                  | ‚úÖ             | ‚úÖ                                                  |
| Free                             | ‚úÖ             | ‚ö†Ô∏è (Basic version is free)                          |
| Offline support                  | ‚úÖ             | ‚ö†Ô∏è (Only supports offline mode in the windows app)  |
| Image export                     | ‚úÖ             | ‚ö†Ô∏è (Only supports printing)                         |
| Infinite drawing board           | ‚úÖ             | ‚ö†Ô∏è (Only supports moving in the positive direction) |
| Cross platform                   | ‚úÖ             | ‚ùå                                                  |
| Local                            | ‚úÖ             | ‚ùå                                                  |
| Opensource                       | ‚úÖ             | ‚ùå                                                  |
